#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int MAXN = 35 + 9;

int dp[MAXN];
int cnt[MAXN];
int prev[MAXN];
int tc;
string s;

int main (){
	scanf("%d",&tc);
	while(tc--){
		cin >> s; int len = (int)s.length();
		for(int i = 0;i < MAXN;++i){
			dp[i] = cnt[i] = 0;
			prev[i] = -1;
		}		
		for(int i = 0;i < len;++i){
			cnt[s[i] - 'a']++;
		}
		int lastIdx = 0;
		for(int i = 0;i < 26;++i){
			if(cnt[i] == 0)
				continue;
			dp[i] = 1;
			for(int j = 0;j < i;++j){
				if(cnt[i] >= cnt[j]){
					if(1 + dp[j] > dp[i]){
						dp[i] = dp[j] + 1;
						prev[i] = j;
					}
				}
			}
			if(dp[i] > dp[lastIdx]){
				lastIdx = i;
			}
		}
		string ans = "";
		while(lastIdx != -1){
			ans += char('a' + lastIdx);
			lastIdx = prev[lastIdx];
		}
		reverse(ans.begin(),ans.end());
		printf("%s\n",ans.c_str());
	}
	return 0;
}
